name: Bodyweight Leg Workouts
description: Strengthening lower body muscles using bodyweight resistance.

cards.title: Pistol Squats for Single-Leg Strength
cards.description: A unilateral squat movement that enhances leg control and balance.
bulletpoints: Lower yourself down on one leg while extending the other
Keep your chest upright and engage the core
Use assistance (like a band) if needed to build strength

cards.title: Wall Sits for Isometric Endurance
cards.description: Holding a squat position against a wall to build endurance.
bulletpoints: Keep knees at a 90-degree angle for proper form
Engage quadriceps and glutes to hold the position
Increase duration over time to improve endurance
